params.spgNftInitParams: The init params for the SPGNFT collection. See {ISPGNFT-InitParams}.

returns.spgNftContract: The address of the newly created SPGNFT collection.

mintAndRegisterIp(address,address,(strin.details: Requires caller to have the minter role or the SPG NFT to allow public minting.

params.allowDuplicates: Set to true to allow minting an NFT with a duplicate metadata hash. If a duplicate is found, returns existing token Id and IP Id instead of minting/registering a new one.
params.ipMetadata: OPTIONAL. The desired metadata for the newly minted NFT and registered IP.
params.recipient: The address of the recipient of the minted NFT.
params.spgNftContract: The address of the SPGNFT collection.

returns.ipId: The ID of the registered IP.
returns.tokenId: The ID of the newly minted NFT.

params.ipMetadata: OPTIONAL. The desired metadata for the newly registered IP.
params.nftContract: The address of the NFT collection.
params.sigMetadata: OPTIONAL. Signature data for setAll (metadata) for the IP via the Core Metadata Module.

returns.ipId: The ID of the newly registered IP.

createCollection((string,string,string,s.notice: Creates a new NFT collection to be used by SPG.

mintAndRegisterIp(address,address,(strin.notice: Mint an NFT from a SPGNFT collection and register it with metadata as an IP.

mintAndRegisterIp_deprecated(address,add.notice: Mint an NFT from a SPGNFT collection and register it with metadata as an IP.THIS VERSION OF THE FUNCTION IS DEPRECATED, WILL BE REMOVED IN V1.4

registerIp(address,uint256,(string,bytes.notice: Registers an NFT as IP with metadata.
